src:
نرخ انواع حبوبات غیر شرکتی

برای خرید حبوبات غیر شرکتی از میادین میوه و تره بار باید از کیلویی ۴ هزار تا ۴۸ هزار تومان هزینه کرد.
02 Nov 2019, 14:41 by بولتن نیوز | bultannews.com
به گزارش بولتن نیوز، نرخ انواع حبوبات غیر شرکتی در میادین میوه و تره بار به شرح زیر است:
text:
SK opened a criminal case after the death of a person during a fire at the Kuzbass enterprise
The incident occurred on the morning of November 2.
02 Nov 2019, 14:01 by Ekaterina Bukhtiyarova
Employees of the Investigative Committee, after conducting a preliminary investigation, opened a criminal investigation into the death of an employee of the Siberian Recycling Center, Sibdepo told the press service of the regional Investigative Department of the Investigative Committee of the Russian Federation for the Kemerovo Region.
“The criminal case under article 143, part 2,“ Violation of labor protection requirements, resulting in the death of a person through negligence, ”was instituted on the fact of the death of an employee of the enterprise,” Sibdepo said in the department.
Recall that as a result of a fire in the territory of production and storage facilities 800 square meters burned out. A 27-year-old man died, his colleague was injured.
According to preliminary data, four workers were in the room, they unloaded the container with the waste, the ignition of the cargo occurred. As a result, a fire broke out in the building, three workers were able to leave the premises on their own, called the employees of the Ministry of Emergencies.
Photo: Sibdepo archive.
